channel.title: One thing
channel.description: Whats one thing you miss from the site? Just a simple discussion, I'm not trying to bring back the old MoparScape or anything lame like that. I for one miss how people use to say "Cookies for you" more. (For those of you who will point out how my account is only about half a year old, my other one was hacked, I'm about a 4 year vet.) But yeah, whats your one thing you miss?

item.title: One thing
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:46, topic:397046”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=494201.msg3616484#msg3616484 date=1307026520]

Mr Potato. he was epic.

Did he die?

no he decided to leave

To be honest, I don’t miss any of them, It’s nice to be able to come onto the community without having useless shit crammed into your eyeballs.

useless shit > what you’ve contributed / nothing

i gave my opinion.

well you don’t miss anyone because you never formed e-bonds with anyone on here

why the fuck would i want to do that. No offence but you may be a brown nose, but I am not. You are strangers, thats all you will ever be.
[/quote]
was being sarcastic to an extent but okay take it seriously LOL[/quote]

Oh, Sorry then, It didn’t come across as sarcastic. If thats the case I apologise if I offended you in anyway.

Read full topic

[/quote]
both are trolls and have no place on this site.

I agree, and Andrew you have been on this site for only 6 months. Not much has changed in 6 months.
